MapMetadata.Description: After four years adrift in space, Cortana awakens the Master Chief to investigate a disturbance on the Forward Unto Dawn.
MapMetadata.Name: Dawn

MapMetadata.Description: Having survived the destruction of the Dawn, Master Chief and Cortana search for a way off of the mysterious Forerunner planet.
MapMetadata.Name: Requiem

MapMetadata.Description: Master Chief tracks the Infinity's signal to Requiem's core, in the hopes of returning Cortana to Earth to address her rampancy.
MapMetadata.Name: Forerunners

MapMetadata.Description: Following the Didact to Infinity's crash site, Chief and Cortana descend into the surrounding swamp to rescue UNSC survivors.
MapMetadata.Name: Infinity

MapMetadata.Description: Infinity sends the Master Chief and Gypsy Company to neutralize the gravity well keeping them on Requiem.
MapMetadata.Name: Reclaimer

MapMetadata.Description: As Infinity flees Requiem and Cortana's rampancy worsens, Master Chief struggles to stop the Didact from pursuing the Composer.
MapMetadata.Name: Shutdown

MapMetadata.Description: The Master Chief's pursuit of the Didact leads him to a UNSC science station orbiting Halo Installation 03.
MapMetadata.Name: Composer

MapMetadata.Description: With the Composer in the Didact's possession, Chief and Cortana must destroy the device before the turns it on his next target.
MapMetadata.Name: Midnight

MapMetadata.Description: Initial surveys of Erebus VII were promising and hopeful, but the events which followed tell a far darker story.
MapMetadata.Name: Abandon

MapMetadata.Description: Now fully dedicated to supporting the war effort, this mining vessel once served the UNSC's colonization efforts.
MapMetadata.Name: Adrift

MapMetadata.Description: Galileo's compartmentalized layout benefits protracted defensive stands in the unlikely event of an attack.
MapMetadata.Name: Complex

MapMetadata.Description: Sites like this allow researchers the ability to closely observe a world's inner workings prior to colonization.
MapMetadata.Name: Erosion

MapMetadata.Description: Stranded on a remote world, a handful of survivors managed to use their ship's debris to thrive long after the crash.
MapMetadata.Name: Exile

MapMetadata.Description: Hidden deep within the clouds, harmonic resonance platforms are believed to sustain the existence of artificial stars.
MapMetadata.Name: Haven

MapMetadata.Description: Collision craters rarely elicit the need for embedded teams, but the contents of this particular site demanded it.
MapMetadata.Name: Impact

MapMetadata.Description: Powerful channel-based mass drivers like these were once used to launch monitoring relays deep into space.
MapMetadata.Name: Longbow

MapMetadata.Description: The catastrophic effects of this reactor's systemic breakdown will eventually rend this icy moon into pieces.
MapMetadata.Name: Meltdown

MapMetadata.Description: Now integrated into the War Games simulation, this curiously hidden gorge was once the site of a Spartan deployment.
MapMetadata.Name: Ragnarok

MapMetadata.Description: Seismic scans indicate that these looming citadels only hint at the enormous structure which lies beneath.
MapMetadata.Name: Ravine

MapMetadata.Description: A testament to the Forerunner's technological prowess, this installation was designed to suspend the death of a star.
MapMetadata.Name: Solace

MapMetadata.Description: ONI personnel remain convinced that these ancient structures somehow harness the planet's torrential wind for power.
MapMetadata.Name: Vortex

MapMetadata.Description: One of many attempts to contain the Flood, Line installations were designed to viciously force down any ships within range.
MapMetadata.Name: Wreckage

MapMetadata.Description: Similar to those found on other agrarian worlds, this impressive tether network was used to ferry resources off-planet.
MapMetadata.Name: Harvest

MapMetadata.Description: Excessive volcanic activity may bring an end to the Materials Group's mining operation on Chi Ceti IV's moon.
MapMetadata.Name: Shatter

MapMetadata.Description: Forgotten in the tide of an asteroid field, the Forerunners built this monument to remember their fallen warriors.
MapMetadata.Name: Monolith

MapMetadata.Description: High above the city of Mindoro, a tether build site provides excellent terrain for infantry warfare.
MapMetadata.Name: Skyline

MapMetadata.Description: Tribute's capital served as the key battleground against the Covenant's brutal assault of this system.
MapMetadata.Name: Landfall

MapMetadata.Description: Although it is being currently used as a military staging ground, this fertile world will one day be colonized.
MapMetadata.Name: Daybreak

MapMetadata.Description: Dissident strongholds such as this one helped foment several anti-centralization movements.
MapMetadata.Name: Outcast

MapMetadata.Description: City-wide evacuation orders have confirmed that the unstable thermal reactor cannot be contained.
MapMetadata.Name: Perdition

MapMetadata.Description: The improbable islands known as the 'Great Anvils' are easily one of the most remarkable features of Requiem.
MapMetadata.Name: Forge Island

MapMetadata.Description: Some UNSC combat facilities have been integrated into the War Games for their extraordinary tactical utility.
MapMetadata.Name: Pitfall

MapMetadata.Description: Due to its volatile weather conditions, isolated research centers dot this world's vast and tempestuous oceans.
MapMetadata.Name: Vertigo
